includedAssets.title: The Old Wagon
includedAssets.synopsis: Season two of the Emmy-winning comedy. Phil finally agrees to sell the family's old station wagon, but not before a trip down memory lane.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season two of the Emmy-winning comedy. Phil finally agrees to sell the family's old station wagon, but not before a trip down memory lane.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Season two of the Emmy-winning comedy. Phil finally agrees to sell the family's old station wagon, but not before a trip down memory lane.

includedAssets.title: The Kiss
includedAssets.synopsis: When Cameron critiques Mitchell over his fear of public displays of affection, the whole clan begin to examine Jay's approach to fatherhood.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Cameron critiques Mitchell over his fear of public displays of affection, the whole clan begin to examine Jay's approach to fatherhood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Cameron critiques Mitchell over his fear of public displays of affection, the whole clan begin to examine Jay's approach to fatherhood.

includedAssets.title: Earthquake
includedAssets.synopsis: An earthquake hits and, though merely a tremor, it affects each family member in their own way... Nathan Lane makes a memorable appearance as Cam's BFF too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An earthquake hits and, though merely a tremor, it affects each family member in their own way... Nathan Lane guest stars as Cam's BFF.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An earthquake hits and, though merely a tremor, it affects each family member in their own way... Nathan Lane makes a memorable appearance as Cam's BFF too.

includedAssets.title: Strangers On A Treadmill
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - Strangers On A Treadmill
includedAssets.synopsis: In a laugh-out-loud homage to Hitchcock's Strangers On A Train, Claire and Mitchell must tell Phil and Cameron some harsh home truths.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a laugh-out-loud homage to Hitchcock's Strangers On A Train, Claire and Mitchell must tell Phil and Cameron some harsh home truths.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a laugh-out-loud homage to Hitchcock's Strangers On A Train, Claire and Mitchell must tell Phil and Cameron some harsh home truths.

includedAssets.title: Unplugged
includedAssets.synopsis: The Dunphys try to reconnect by enjoying some time apart from their various electronic devices. Mitch and Cam race to get Lily into the best pre-schools as well.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Dunphys try to reconnect by enjoying some time apart from their electronic devices. Mitch and Cam race to get Lily into the best pre-school too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Dunphys try to reconnect by enjoying some time apart from their various electronic devices. Mitch and Cam race to get Lily into the best pre-schools as well.

includedAssets.title: Halloween
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire is all set to 'spookify' the Dunphy household, but the rest of the clan aren't as enthusiastic. Plus, Cam is haunted by a traumatic childhood experience.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire is all set to 'spookify' the Dunphy household, but the rest of the clan aren't as enthusiastic. Plus, Cam is haunted by a childhood trauma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Claire is all set to 'spookify' the Dunphy household, but the rest of the clan aren't as enthusiastic. Plus, Cam is haunted by a traumatic childhood experience.

includedAssets.title: Chirp
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil is plagued by the bleeping of a broken smoke alarm whose incessant noise is screaming 'you're not a man' at him. Unmissable Emmy-winning comedy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil is plagued by the bleeping of a broken smoke alarm whose incessant noise is screaming 'you're not a man' at him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Phil is plagued by the bleeping of a broken smoke alarm whose incessant noise is screaming 'you're not a man' at him. Unmissable Emmy-winning comedy.

includedAssets.title: Manny Get Your Gun
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep8 - Manny Get Your Gun
includedAssets.synopsis: It may be his birthday but poor Manny isn't in the mood to celebrate. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire engage in a car race, and Mitch and Cam get sidetracked.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It may be his birthday but Manny isn't in the mood to celebrate. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire engage in a car race, and Mitch and Cam get sidetracked.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It may be his birthday but poor Manny isn't in the mood to celebrate. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire engage in a car race, and Mitch and Cam get sidetracked.

includedAssets.title: Mother Tucker
includedAssets.synopsis: Cameron is delighted when his mum, Barb, comes to town but the same can't be said for Mitchell. Plus, Haley's decision to split with Dylan hits Phil hard.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cameron is delighted when his mum comes to town but the same can't be said for Mitchell. Plus, Haley's decision to split with Dylan hits Phil hard.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cameron is delighted when his mum, Barb, comes to town but the same can't be said for Mitchell. Plus, Haley's decision to split with Dylan hits Phil hard.

includedAssets.title: Dance Dance Revelation
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Luke and Manny's first dance and everyone's getting involved in the 'fun'. Mitch and Cam learn that Lily has a slight teething problem too...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Luke and Manny's first dance and everyone's getting involved in the 'fun'. Mitch and Cam learn that Lily has a slight teething problem too...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Luke and Manny's first dance and everyone's getting involved in the 'fun'. Mitch and Cam learn that Lily has a slight teething problem too...

includedAssets.title: Slow Down Your Neighbours
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep11 - Slow Down Your Neighbours
includedAssets.synopsis: In this comeback fix, Claire tries to track down a speeding driver and Jay teaches Manny and Gloria to ride a bike. Guest starring James Marsden.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In this comeback fix, Claire tries to track down a speeding driver and Jay teaches Manny and Gloria to ride a bike. Guest starring James Marsden.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In this comeback fix, Claire tries to track down a speeding driver and Jay teaches Manny and Gloria to ride a bike. Guest starring James Marsden.

includedAssets.title: Our Children, Ourselves
includedAssets.synopsis: After bumping into his female ex, Mitch ponders the possibility that a mini-Mitchell may be out there. 24 favourite Mary Lynn Rajskub guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After bumping into his female ex, Mitch ponders the possibility that a mini-Mitchell may be out there. 24 favourite Mary Lynn Rajskub guest stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After bumping into his female ex, Mitch ponders the possibility that a mini-Mitchell may be out there. 24 favourite Mary Lynn Rajskub guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Caught In The Act
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep13 - Caught In The Act
includedAssets.synopsis: The Dunphy brood catch their parents in an, ahem, compromising position, and Mitch and Cam take desperate measures to get a table in a restaurant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Dunphy brood catch their parents in an, ahem, compromising position, and Mitch and Cam take desperate measures to get a table in a restaurant.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Dunphy brood catch their parents in an, ahem, compromising position, and Mitch and Cam take desperate measures to get a table in a restaurant.

includedAssets.title: Bixby's Back
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day and that can only mean one thing, the return of Clive Bixby! Plus, Mitchell's PA proves problematic, and Jay and Gloria get competitive.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Valentine's Day and that can only mean one thing, the return of Clive Bixby! Plus, Mitchell's PA proves problematic.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Valentine's Day and that can only mean one thing, the return of Clive Bixby! Plus, Mitchell's PA proves problematic, and Jay and Gloria get competitive.

includedAssets.title: Princess Party
includedAssets.synopsis: DeDe's back in town to celebrate Lily's second birthday and she's brought some baggage from the past with her. Guest starring Shelley Long and Matt Dillon.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: DeDe's back in town to celebrate Lily's second birthday and she's brought some baggage from the past with her. Guest starring Matt Dillon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: DeDe's back in town to celebrate Lily's second birthday and she's brought some baggage from the past with her. Guest starring Shelley Long and Matt Dillon.

includedAssets.title: Regrets Only
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil and Claire have the mother of all barneys, started by cauliflower and involving broccoli. Meanwhile, Jay regrets buying Gloria a karaoke machine.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil and Claire have the mother of all barneys, started by cauliflower and involving broccoli. Meanwhile, Jay regrets buying Gloria a karaoke machine.

includedAssets.title: Two Monkeys And A Panda
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep17 - Two Monkeys And A Panda
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay treats Gloria to a shopping trip... to buy a crypt. Plus, Cam discovers that an important detail is missing from Lily's birth certificate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jay treats Gloria to a shopping trip... to buy a crypt. Plus, Cam discovers that an important detail is missing from Lily's birth certificate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jay treats Gloria to a shopping trip... to buy a crypt. Plus, Cam discovers that an important detail is missing from Lily's birth certificate.

includedAssets.title: Boy's Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay accidentally gatecrashes Mitch and Cam's evening out, and Luke befriends his crotchety old neighbour. Guest starring Nathan Lane and Philip Baker Hall.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jay accidentally gatecrashes Mitch and Cam's evening out, and Luke befriends his crotchety old neighbour. Guest starring Nathan Lane.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jay accidentally gatecrashes Mitch and Cam's evening out, and Luke befriends his crotchety old neighbour. Guest starring Nathan Lane and Philip Baker Hall.

includedAssets.title: The Musical Man
includedAssets.synopsis: Cam accepts the role of music director at Luke and Manny's school, but his enthusiasm is far from infectious. Meanwhile, Jay's brother Donnie is in town.

includedAssets.title: Someone To Watch Over Lily
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep20 - Someone To Watch Over Lily
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitch and Cam have a big decision to make, one that involves a spot of sleuthing and the parenting skills of certain family members...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mitch and Cam have a big decision to make, one that involves a spot of sleuthing and the parenting skills of certain family members...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mitch and Cam have a big decision to make, one that involves a spot of sleuthing and the parenting skills of certain family members...

includedAssets.title: Mother's Day
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire and Gloria's plan to spend quality time with their kids in the outdoors backfires. Plus, Phil witnesses an unexpected moment of weakness from Jay.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire and Gloria's plan to spend quality time with their kids in the outdoors backfires. Phil witnesses an unexpected moment of weakness from Jay.

includedAssets.title: Good Cop Bad Dog
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep22 - Good Cop Bad Dog
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire and Phil swap parenting roles, and Mitchell has a dilemma on his hands when Cameron falls ill. Fred Savage, of The Wonder Years fame, directs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire and Phil swap parenting roles, and Mitchell has a dilemma on his hands when Cameron falls ill. Fred Savage, of The Wonder Years fame, directs.

includedAssets.title: See You Next Fall
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep23 - See You Next Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: In this penultimate instalment, a chain of events, involving Botox and a tantrum or two, mean the family may miss Alex's graduation from middle school.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A chain of events, involving Botox and a tantrum or two, mean the family may miss Alex's graduation from middle school.

includedAssets.title: The One That Got Away
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep24 - The One That Got Away
includedAssets.synopsis: It's time to part ways with the Dunphys, Pritchetts and Pritchett-Tuckers in this second season finale. Plans to celebrate Jay's birthday go awry...
